short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically uploads the replay of your last battle in PSD then it will be copied to your clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension extends the Pokemon Showdown website to include some helping functions for PASRS Tracking Excel Sheets.

Does that by automatically generating replay URL (even if you forfeit by closing the battle room.) Then it is copied to the clipboard. This lets you just paste it in PASRS rather than doing the same thing with 5-6 clicks.
